entry.title: Notes for Markdown -- switch within one page
entry.content: This note is a follow-up of Notes for Blog Writing by Hexo and NexT – basic syntax. These notes will form a serie of notes about Hexo, NexT and Markdown. Switch to certain position within a pageFirst method Syntax 123456789* [1. Introduction](#1) * [1.1 History](#1.1)<h1 id="1">1. Introduction</h1> //Notes: h1 means # and h2 means ##Brief introduction<h2 id="1.1">1.1 History</h2>History incidentsNotes: [name](# + anchor) ; <h2 id="anchor">position</h2> effets: 1. Introduction 1.1 History 1. IntroductionBrief introduction 1.1 HistoryHistory incidents Second method syntax: 123<span id="jump">Hello World</span>[XXXX](#jump) effects:Hello World XXXX

entry.title: Notes for Blog Writing by Hexo and NexT -- basic syntax
entry.content: Create a article hexo new “title” Write a article based on MarkdownTitle syntax： 12345678# first title## second title### third title#### fourth title##### fifth title###### sixth titleNotes：# + space + title name effects： Font form syntax： 1234*italic***bold*****italic bold***~~strikethrough~~ effects：italicbolditalic boldstrikethrough Website links syntax： 12[my blog](http://taotaobao.github.io)<https://taotaobao.github.io> effect：my bloghttps://taotaobao.github.io Quotation syntax： 123> words or sentences quotedNotes：> + space + words or sentences quoted effect： words or sentences quoted Codes syntax： 123456`codes in a single line`aaacodes in multi-linescodes in multi-linesaaa（Notes：a = `） effects： codes in a single line 12codes in multi-linescodes in multi-lines Separation line syntax： 12---*** effects： Lists unordered lists： syntax： 123* listed items- listed items+ listed items effects： listed items listed items listed items ordered lists syntax： 1231. red2. green3. blue effects： red green blue Tables syntax： 1234|on the left|on the right|in the middle||:-----|------:|:----:||content11|content12|content13||content21|content22|content23| effect： on the left on the right in the middle content11 content12 content13 content21 content22 content23 Notes： 表格的语句上一行必须为空行，不然表格不生效。 |、-、:之间的多余空格会被忽略，不影响布局。 默认标题栏居中对齐，内容居左对齐。 -:表示内容和标题栏居右对齐，:-表示内容和标题栏居左对齐，:-:表示内容和标题栏居中对齐。 内容和|之间的多余空格会被忽略，每行第一个|和最后一个|可以省略，-的数量至少有一个。 Pictures syntax： 1![](/Notes-for-hexo-writing/avatar.png) effects Notes：一般图片放在和hexo new “title”一起生成的同名的文件夹中，调用时候直接用title/picturename.png即可 How to control the position and size? syntax: 12<img src="/Notes-for-hexo-writing/avatar.png" align='middle' height="100" width="50"><img src='/Notes-for-hexo-writing/avatar.png' align='left' height="100" width="50"> effects: Superscript and subscript syntax 1<sup>13</sup>CO<sub>2</sub> effects13CO2 Start a new paragraph syntax 123I am TTB<br/>I am TaoTaoBao effectsI am TTBI am TaoTaoBao Read more syntax1<!--more--> Font face, size and color syntax： 12345<font face="黑体">我是黑体字</font><font face="微软雅黑">我是微软雅黑字</font><font face="STCAIYUN">我是华文彩云字</font><font color=#0099ff size=7 face="黑体">我是黑体字</font><font color=gray size=10 face="宋体">我是宋体字</font> effects： 我是黑体字我是微软雅黑字我是华文彩云字我是3号#0099ff的黑体字我是5号灰色宋体字 颜色名称色值表： Notes:Here are two websites for reference:https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntaxhttps://www.appinn.com/markdown/

entry.title: Hello, World!
entry.content: Welcome to TaoTaoBao’s Blog Every blog starts with ‘Hello World!’, so do mine. I am TaoTaoBao, the maker of this Blog. My Blog contains my occational thoughts and records my life, including normal life and research career with happiness and sorrow. Also, TaoTaoBao’s Blog is the place where I write articles about CFA learning and Fintech. I’d like to study finance and economics in both fundamental and technical ways. I plan to include the prospectus study, which is, I think, the best way to understand the industry. Last but not least, I will blog my English learning details, which I hope can motivate me to learn English better everyday, and my reading about tranditional cultural materials (history, philosophy and literature), which can help me improve my EQ and find my dream.
